postInstallNotes:
This package provides the Weave Scope probe container, which reports data to the `weavescope` package which provides the user interface.

More documentation can be found on [Weaveworks website](http://weave.works/deploy-scope-on-dcos).
description:
Live visualisation, monitoring and management

Weave Scope produces a live interactive map of your containerized services and applications with no coding and no instrumentation
name: weavescope-probe
